me.kiip.sdk
Class KiipFragment

java.lang.Object
  android.app.Fragment
      me.kiip.sdk.KiipFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
public class KiipFragment
extends android.app.Fragment

A Fragment extension to manage displaying Kiip views to provide continuity and prevent window leaks.

Author:
Grantland Chew

Method Detail

setDefaultQueue

public static void setDefaultQueue(java.util.List<Poptart> queue)
Sets the global Poptart queue. Create and set a default queue if you would like Poptarts to persist across Activity changes.

Parameters:
queue - A queue of Poptarts.

getDefaultQueue

public static java.util.List<Poptart> getDefaultQueue()
Returns the global Poptart queue.

Returns:
The global Poptart queue.

showPoptart

public void showPoptart(Poptart poptart)
Shows a Poptart. The Poptart will then be managed by KiipFragment.

Parameters:
poptart -

dismissPoptart

public void dismissPoptart(Poptart poptart)
Cancels a given Poptart. Will do nothing if the Poptart is not showing or no longer in the queue.

Parameters:
poptart -

setOnShowListener

public void setOnShowListener(android.content.DialogInterface.OnShowListener listener)
Sets a listener to be invoked when a Poptart is shown. This should be used instead of setting a listener on the Poptart directly.

Parameters:
